sellers who end their price with ‘00’ typically receive offers that are five to eight per cent lower than those with more specific prices. Caught on Camera premieres on Science Channel Monday, April 13. Series reveals the extraordinary footage taken by people in the middle of the drama. Each natural or man-made occurrence is deconstructed with graphics, illustrating and explaining the incredible facts behind each freak catastrophe or survival.
